meanings.sent1: The arteriographic image showed the doctor the condition of the patient's arteries.
meanings.sent2: The arteriographic procedure helped the medical team identify any blockages in the arteries.
meanings.sent3: The arteriographic results were so clear, they almost looked like a painting!
meanings.sent4: Her arteriographic knowledge was like having a map of the body's highways.
meanings.sent5: The arteriographic details were etched in the doctor's mind for future reference.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the visualization of arteries using radiographic techniques.
meanings.sent1: The arteriographic scan provided a detailed view of the arteries in the patient's leg.
meanings.sent2: Doctors used arteriographic technology to examine the blood flow in the arteries.
meanings.sent3: The arteriographic equipment hummed softly as it captured images of the arteries.
meanings.sent4: His arteriographic expertise allowed him to see beyond what the naked eye could detect.
meanings.sent5: The arteriographic process illuminated the inner workings of the body like a flashlight in the dark.
